content:
@Jan Range check this out:

"This new library has been called dataverse-ui-lib and can be used like import { Navbar } from 'dataverse-ui-lib'" -- https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-frontend/pull/81

This might be useful for EasyReview or any integration written in React that wants a similar look and feel as the (upcoming) React-based Dataverse frontend.

Or I'm thinking of a future version of your H5Web previewer, once we ship a Dataverse frontend written in React: https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-previewers/pull/30

Or all previewers, I guess, if we rewrite them into React. This was talked about briefly the other day during our monthly team meeting.

@Philip Durbin sounds great! Thanks for sending :-)

I am currently taking the re-design of EasyReview back up and will incorporate the module. Making it look more like Dataverse surely aids the user experience I guess.
